/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings and construction cranes, indicating a city in the throes of development. Cars and trucks traverse the street, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds visible in the distance. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the urban landscape.
